Symbol.Script_3D:
addx strart_hole pen usl_side if show_type<>SHOW_3D and show_type<>NOT_SHOW then PAPER_TO_MODEL = GLOB_SCALE / 1000 l_zas = diaB*1.1 if GLOB_VIEW_TYPE=3 and l_zas<diaB then l_zas=diaB*1.1 roty 90 addz -l_zas HOTSPOT 0, 0,0, 100, amg2d, 6 HOTSPOT wash1_diam, 0,0, 200, amg2d, 4 HOTSPOT wash1_diam*COS(amg2d), wash1_diam*SIN(amg2d),0, 300,amg2d,5 addz 2*l_zas+insideLength HOTSPOT 0, 0,0, 100, amg2d, 6 HOTSPOT wash1_diam, 0,0, 200, amg2d, 4 HOTSPOT wash1_diam*COS(amg2d), wash1_diam*SIN(amg2d),0, 300,amg2d,5 del 3 endif if show_type=SHOW_SIDE then gosub "side" if show_type=SHOW_TOP then rotx amg2d addx -l_zas*0.2 roty 90 gosub "typebl" del 1 addx insideLength + l_zas*0.4 roty 90 gosub "typebl" del 3 endif end "side": hotspot 0,0,0 hotspot insideLength,0,0 if show_mirr then lin_ -l_zas*0.2,0,0, insideLength+l_zas,0,0 else lin_ -l_zas,0,0, insideLength+l_zas*0.2,0,0 endif ts = -l_zas*0.7 te1 = -l_zas te2 = -l_zas*0.4 if show_mirr then addx insideLength+l_zas*1.5 lin_ ts,0,0,te1,-l_zas*0.5,0 lin_ ts,0,0,te1,l_zas*0.5,0 lin_ ts,0,0,te1,0,-l_zas*0.5 lin_ ts,0,0,te1,0,l_zas*0.5 lin_ ts,0,0,te1,-l_zas*0.5,-l_zas*0.5 lin_ ts,0,0,te1,l_zas*0.5,-l_zas*0.5 lin_ ts,0,0,te1,-l_zas*0.5,l_zas*0.5 lin_ ts,0,0,te1,l_zas*0.5,l_zas*0.5 lin_ ts,0,0,te2,-l_zas*0.5,0 lin_ ts,0,0,te2,l_zas*0.5,0 lin_ ts,0,0,te2,0,-l_zas*0.5 lin_ ts,0,0,te2,0,l_zas*0.5 lin_ ts,0,0,te2,-l_zas*0.5,-l_zas*0.5 lin_ ts,0,0,te2,l_zas*0.5,-l_zas*0.5 lin_ ts,0,0,te2,-l_zas*0.5,l_zas*0.5 lin_ ts,0,0,te2,l_zas*0.5,l_zas*0.5 if show_mirr then del 1
if show_mirr then ts2 = -l_zas*0.2 else ts2 = -l_zas*0.1 endif gosub "shb" if show_mirr then ts2 = insideLength+l_zas*0.1 else ts2 = insideLength+l_zas*0.2 endif gosub "shb" return
"typebl": if bolt_type=StandingB or bolt_type=ManchorB or bolt_type=ChimanchorB or bolt_type=FoundB then rotz 45 pen usl_osn lin_ -l_zas*0.5,-l_zas*0.5,0,l_zas*0.5,-l_zas*0.5,0 lin_ l_zas*0.5,-l_zas*0.5,0,l_zas*0.5,l_zas*0.5,0 lin_ l_zas*0.5,l_zas*0.5,0,-l_zas*0.5,l_zas*0.5,0 lin_ -l_zas*0.5,l_zas*0.5,0,-l_zas*0.5,-l_zas*0.5,0 pen usl_axis lin_ -l_zas*0.8,-l_zas*0.8,0,l_zas*0.8,l_zas*0.8,0 lin_ l_zas*0.8,-l_zas*0.8,0,-l_zas*0.8,l_zas*0.8,0 del 1 endif if bolt_type=TemporaryB then rotz 45 pen usl_osn lin_ -l_zas*0.5,-l_zas*0.5,0,l_zas*0.5,-l_zas*0.5,0 lin_ l_zas*0.5,-l_zas*0.5,0,l_zas*0.5,l_zas*0.5,0 lin_ l_zas*0.5,l_zas*0.5,0,-l_zas*0.5,l_zas*0.5,0 lin_ -l_zas*0.5,l_zas*0.5,0,-l_zas*0.5,-l_zas*0.5,0 for i=-l_zas*0.5 to l_zas*0.5 step l_zas/10 lin_ -l_zas*0.5,i,0,l_zas*0.5,i,0 lin_ i,-l_zas*0.5,0,i,l_zas*0.5,0 next i pen usl_axis lin_ -l_zas*0.8,-l_zas*0.8,0,l_zas*0.8,l_zas*0.8,0 lin_ l_zas*0.8,-l_zas*0.8,0,-l_zas*0.8,l_zas*0.8,0 del 1 endif
if bolt_type=HstrengthB then pen usl_osn lin_ -l_zas*0.6,0,0,l_zas*0.4,-l_zas*0.5,0 lin_ -l_zas*0.6,0,0,l_zas*0.4,l_zas*0.5,0 lin_ l_zas*0.4,l_zas*0.5,0,l_zas*0.4,-l_zas*0.5,0 pen usl_axis lin_ -l_zas*0.8,0,0,l_zas*0.8,0,0 lin_ 0,-l_zas*0.8,0,0,l_zas*0.8,0 endif return
"shb": pen usl_side lin_ ts2,l_zas*0.8,0,ts2,-l_zas*0.8,0 lin_ ts2,0,-l_zas*0.8,ts2,0,l_zas*0.8 lin_ ts2,l_zas*0.8,l_zas*0.8,ts2,-l_zas*0.8,-l_zas*0.8 lin_ ts2,l_zas*0.8,l_zas*0.8,ts2,l_zas*0.8,l_zas*0.8 lin_ ts2,-l_zas*0.8,-l_zas*0.8,ts2,l_zas*0.8,l_zas*0.8 return
Symbol.Script_1D:
EPS=0.0001 NOT_SET = -1 NOT_SHOW = 0 SHOW_3D = 1 SHOW_TOP = 2 SHOW_SIDE = 3
StandingB = 1 TemporaryB = 2 HstrengthB = 3 ChimanchorB = 4 ManchorB = 5 FoundB = 6
PARAMETERS tip_el = "40"
dim itype_hole[] dim ttype_hole[] : i=0 i=i+1 : itype_hole[i]=1 : ttype_hole[i] = "Круглое" i=i+1 : itype_hole[i]=2 : ttype_hole[i] = "Овальное" i=i+1 : itype_hole[i]=3 : ttype_hole[i] = "Овально-прямоугольное"
dim iis_stud[] dim tis_stud[] : i=0 i=i+1 : iis_stud[i]=0 : tis_stud[i] = "Болт" i=i+1 : iis_stud[i]=1 : tis_stud[i] = "Шпилька"
dim ibolt_type[] dim tbolt_type[] : i=0 i=i+1 : ibolt_type[i]=StandingB : tbolt_type[i] = "Постоянный" i=i+1 : ibolt_type[i]=TemporaryB : tbolt_type[i] = "Временный" i=i+1 : ibolt_type[i]=HstrengthB : tbolt_type[i] = "Высокопрочный" i=i+1 : ibolt_type[i]=ManchorB : tbolt_type[i] = "Анкер" i=i+1 : ibolt_type[i]=ChimanchorB : tbolt_type[i] = "Химанкер" i=i+1 : ibolt_type[i]=FoundB : tbolt_type[i] = "Фундаментный болт"
dim iqty_nut[] dim tqty_nut[] : i=0 i=i+1 : iqty_nut[i]=0 : tqty_nut[i] = "Без гаек" i=i+1 : iqty_nut[i]=1 : tqty_nut[i] = "Одна гайка" i=i+1 : iqty_nut[i]=2 : tqty_nut[i] = "Две гайки"
dim iqty_wash[] dim tqty_wash[] : i=0 i=i+1 : iqty_wash[i]=0 : tqty_wash[i] = "Без шайб" i=i+1 : iqty_wash[i]=1 : tqty_wash[i] = "Стандартная" i=i+1 : iqty_wash[i]=2 : tqty_wash[i] = "Стандартная+Пользовательская" i=i+1 : iqty_wash[i]=3 : tqty_wash[i] = "Пользовательская"
dim twash2_type[] : i=0 i=i+1 : twash2_type[i] = "Прямоугольная" i=i+1 : twash2_type[i] = "Круглая"
dim diaB_arr[] : diaB_arr[1]=0 dim d_arr[] dim len_arr_t[] dim hit_arr_t[]
file_bolt = "Болты 7798-70.txt" file_nut = "Гайки 5915-70.txt" file_wash = "Шайбы 11371-78.txt"
dim param_name_out_t[] : i=1 param_name_out_t[1] = "!!Болт!!" i=i+1 : param_name_out_t[i] = "naen - наименование" i=i+1 : param_name_out_t[i] = "obozn - обозначение" i=i+1 : param_name_out_t[i] = "diaB - диаметр" i=i+1 : param_name_out_t[i] = "marka - класс прочности" i=i+1 : param_name_out_t[i] = "Mzat - момент затяжки" i=i+1 : param_name_out_t[i] = "wash2_thk - толщина польз. шайбы" i=i+1 : param_name_out_t[i] = "wash2_a - ширина польз. шайбы" i=i+1 : param_name_out_t[i] = "wash2_b - длина польз. шайбы"
parameters param_name_out = param_name_out_t
Symbol.Script_PR:
spec_all = 1 success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-km", "ignore_id", ignore_id) spec_bolt_t = 1 : IF STRSTR (GLOB_ID, ignore_id, 1) > 0 THEN spec_bolt_t = 0 if spec_all=1 then spec_all = spec_bolt_t call "Показ_по_сборкам" PARAMETERS ALL subpos=subpos, pos=GLOB_ID RETURNED_PARAMETERS show_subpos, show_marker if spec_all=1 then spec_all = show_subpos*show_marker
if spec_bolt*spec_all then call "Спецификатор" parameters tip_el=tip_el, subpos = subpos, pos = GLOB_ID, obozn=obozn, naen=naen, ves=ves, kol_vo_spec=kol_vo_spec, komment=komment
if spec_wash*spec_all then if (wash2_thk*((qty_wash_start=3) or (qty_wash_start=2)) + wash2_thk*((qty_wash_end=3) or (qty_wash_end=2)))>0 then ves_p = 7850 * wash2_thk s_plit_obsh = wash2_a * wash2_b naen = "--" + str("%.0mm", wash2_thk) + "x" + str("%.0mm", min(wash2_a,wash2_b)) + "x" + str("%.0mm", max(wash2_a,wash2_b)) tip_profile = "-- " + str('%.0mm', wash2_thk) n_wash2 = ((qty_wash_start=3) or (qty_wash_start=2)) + ((qty_wash_end=3) or (qty_wash_end=2)) for i=1 to n_wash2*kol_vo_spec call "Спецификатор" parameters tip_el="20", subpos = subpos, pos = GLOB_ID+".1", tip_konstr="Прочие", stal_gost="ГОСТ 27772-88", mater="С245", obozn="ГОСТ 19903-74", tip_profile=tip_profile, dlin_prof=s_plit_obsh, ves=ves_p, naen=naen next i endif endif
Symbol.Script_VL:
if abs(ang2)<EPS then parameters ac_toplevel = diaB parameters ac_bottomlevel = 0 else parameters ac_toplevel = (sin(ang2)*lenB) parameters ac_bottomlevel = 0 endif parameters A = diaB parameters B = diaB parameters ZZYZX = lenB if kol_vo_spec<=0 then parameters kol_vo_spec=1 values{2} "type_hole" itype_hole, ttype_hole values{2} "bolt_type" ibolt_type, tbolt_type values{2} "is_stud" iis_stud, tis_stud values{2} "qty_nut_end" iqty_nut, tqty_nut values{2} "qty_nut_start" iqty_nut, tqty_nut values{2} "qty_wash_end" iqty_wash, tqty_wash values{2} "qty_wash_start" iqty_wash, tqty_wash values "wash2_type" twash2_type values "thread" "Complete", "Partial" values "ang_hole" range [0,360] if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="coord_hole" then if type_hole=2 then if coord_hole[1]<0 then coord_hole[1]=0 if coord_hole[2]>0 then coord_hole[2]=0 endif if type_hole=3 then if coord_hole[1]<>0 then coord_hole[1]=0 if coord_hole[2]>0 then coord_hole[2]=0 endif parameters coord_hole=coord_hole endif
if not((qty_wash_end=1) or (qty_wash_end=2) or (qty_wash_start=1) or (qty_wash_start=2)) then HIDEPARAMETER "wash1_dim" if not((qty_wash_start=3) or (qty_wash_start=2) or (qty_wash_end=3) or (qty_wash_end=2)) then HIDEPARAMETER "wash2_dim" if not(qty_nut_start or qty_nut_end) then HIDEPARAMETER "nut_dim" if wash2_type="Прямоугольная" then HIDEPARAMETER "wash2_diam", "wash2_diam_in" values "wash2_a" range(diaB,) values "wash2_b" range(diaB,) values "wash2_thk" range(0,) parameters wash2_diam=0, wash2_diam_in=0 endif if wash2_type="Круглая" then HIDEPARAMETER "wash2_a", "wash2_b" values "wash2_diam" range(diaB+0.001,) values "wash2_diam_in" range(diaB,) values "wash2_thk" range(0,) parameters wash2_a=0, wash2_b=0 endif
if abs(hit-lenB)<EPS then thread="Complete" else thread="Partial" endif parameters thread=thread
if not(is_stud) then if bolt_type=TemporaryB or bolt_type=HstrengthB or bolt_type=StandingB then values "bolt_subtype" "ГОСТ 7798-70" values "marka" "3.6", "4.6", "4.8", "5.6", "5.8", "6.6", "6.8", "8.8", "9.8", "10.9", "12.9",CUSTOM endif if bolt_type=FoundB then values "bolt_subtype" "ГОСТ 24379.1-2012" values "isp" "с отгибом", "с анк. плитой", "прямой" endif if bolt_subtype="ГОСТ 7798-70" then gosub "7798" if bolt_subtype="ГОСТ 24379.1-2012" then gosub "24379" else PARAMETERS bolt_subtype="" gosub "stud" parameters hit=lenB endif
if vardim1(el_views)<=1 then dim el_tmp[] for i=1 to 20 el_tmp[i] = " " next i parameters el_views = el_tmp endif
end
"stud": file_bolt = "Болты 7798-70.txt" file_nut = "Гайки 5915-70.txt" file_wash = "Шайбы 11371-78.txt" PARAMETERS nut_type = file_nut PARAMETERS wash1_type = file_wash gosub "get_diam_bolt" : diaB_arr = d_arr values "diaB" diaB_arr if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="diaB" then diam = diaB gosub "get_dim" endif return
"24379": file_bolt = "Болты 24379.1-2012.txt" file_nut = "Гайки 5915-70.txt" file_wash = "Шайбы 24379.1-2012.txt" lock "hit", "marka", "thread" PARAMETERS nut_type = file_nut PARAMETERS wash1_type = file_wash HIDEPARAMETER "bolt_wrench" gosub "get_diam_bolt" : diaB_arr = d_arr values "diaB" diaB_arr if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="diaB" then diam = diaB gosub "get_dim_nut" parameters nut_wrench=nut_wrench_t, nut_thk=nut_thk_t, nut_diam=nut_diam_t gosub "get_dim_wash" parameters wash1_thk=wash1_thk_t, wash1_diam=wash1_diam_t, wash1_diam_in=wash1_diam_in_t
ch2 = open("text", file_bolt, "separator='\t', mode=ro, LIBRARY") t = 0 : n = input (ch2, 2, inxd, t) : bolt_tpi_t1 = t/1000 t = 0 : n = input (ch2, 4, inxd, t) : bolt_body_t = t/1000 t = 0 : n = input (ch2, 8, inxd, t) : bolt_hit_t = t/1000 t = 0 : n = input (ch2, 9, inxd, t) : bolt_lz_t = t/1000 t = 0 : n = input (ch2, 10, inxd, t) : bolt_rad_t = t/1000 t = 0 : n = input (ch2, 11, inxd, t) : bolt_ank_t = t/1000 close ch2 parameters bolt_body=bolt_body_t, bolt_wrench="", bolt_thk=bolt_lz_t, bolt_diam=bolt_ank_t, bolt_tpi=bolt_tpi_t1, hit=bolt_hit_t endif PARAMETERS obozn = "ГОСТ 24379.1-2012 " PARAMETERS ves = lenB*7850*3.14*diaB*diaB/4 if isp = "с отгибом" then isp_t = " 1.1 " if isp = "с анк. плитой" then isp_t = " 2.1 " if isp = "прямой" then isp_t = " 5 " PARAMETERS naen = "Болт" + isp_t + "М" + str("%.0mm",diaB) + "x" + str("%.0mm",lenB) return
"7798": file_bolt = "Болты 7798-70.txt" file_nut = "Гайки 5915-70.txt" file_wash = "Шайбы 11371-78.txt" PARAMETERS nut_type = file_nut PARAMETERS wash1_type = file_wash HIDEPARAMETER "qty_nut_start" PARAMETERS qty_nut_start = 0 lock "hit", "thread" gosub "get_diam_bolt" : diaB_arr = d_arr values "diaB" diaB_arr if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="diaB" then diam = diaB : gosub "get_bolt_len" parameters len_arr = len_arr_t, hit_arr = hit_arr_t gosub "get_dim" endif values "lenB" len_arr
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="diaB" or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="lenB" then diam = diaB : len = lenB : gosub "get_bolt_hit" parameters hit = hit_t endif parameters obozn = "ГОСТ 7798-70" parameters naen = "Болт "+"M"+str("%.0",diaB*1000) return
"get_dim": gosub "get_dim_bolt" values "bolt_tpi" bolt_tpi_t1, bolt_tpi_t2 parameters bolt_body=bolt_body_t, bolt_wrench=bolt_wrench_t, bolt_thk=bolt_thk_t, bolt_diam=bolt_diam_t
gosub "get_dim_nut" parameters nut_wrench=nut_wrench_t, nut_thk=nut_thk_t, nut_diam=nut_diam_t
gosub "get_dim_wash" parameters wash1_thk=wash1_thk_t, wash1_diam=wash1_diam_t, wash1_diam_in=wash1_diam_in_t return
"get_dim_nut": file_name = file_nut : gosub "get_inx" ch2 = open("text", file_name, "separator='\t', mode=ro, LIBRARY") t = 0 : n = input (ch2, 2, inxd, t) : nut_wrench_t = str("%.0",t) t = 0 : n = input (ch2, 3, inxd, t) : nut_thk_t = t/1000 t = 0 : n = input (ch2, 4, inxd, t) : nut_diam_t = t/1000 close ch2 return
"get_dim_bolt": file_name = file_bolt : gosub "get_inx" ch2 = open("text", file_name, "separator='\t', mode=ro, LIBRARY") t = 0 : n = input (ch2, 2, inxd, t) : bolt_tpi_t1 = t/1000 t = 0 : n = input (ch2, 3, inxd, t) : bolt_tpi_t2 = t/1000 t = 0 : n = input (ch2, 4, inxd, t) : bolt_body_t = t/1000 t = 0 : n = input (ch2, 5, inxd, t) : bolt_wrench_t = str("%.0",t) t = 0 : n = input (ch2, 6, inxd, t) : bolt_thk_t = t/1000 t = 0 : n = input (ch2, 7, inxd, t) : bolt_diam_t = t/1000 close ch2 return
"get_dim_wash": file_name = file_wash : gosub "get_inx" ch2 = open("text", file_name, "separator='\t', mode=ro, LIBRARY") t = 0 : n = input (ch2, 2, inxd, t) : wash1_diam_in_t = t/1000 t = 0 : n = input (ch2, 4, inxd, t) : wash1_diam_t = t/1000 t = 0 : n = input (ch2, 5, inxd, t) : wash1_thk_t = t/1000 close ch2 return
"get_diam_bolt": ch2 = open("text", file_bolt, "separator='\t', mode=ro, LIBRARY") n = 1 : j = 1 : k = 2 : t = 0 while n<>-1 and k<=40 do n = input (ch2, 1, k, t) if n <> -1 then if vartype(t)=1 then if t>0 then d_arr[j]=t/1000 j = j + 1 t = 0 endif endif endif k = k + 1 endwhile close ch2 return
"get_bolt_len": file_name = file_bolt : gosub "get_inx" ch1 = open("text", file_bolt, "separator='\t', mode=ro, LIBRARY") i = 8 : j = 1 : lhit = 0 : l = 0 n1 = 1 : n2 = 1 while n1 <> -1 and n2 <> -1 and i<1000 do n1 = input (ch1, i, inxd, lhit) n2 = input (ch1, i, 1, l) if vartype(lhit)=1 and vartype(l)=1 then if lhit>=0 and l>0 then if lhit=0 then lhit=l len_arr_t[j] = l/1000 hit_arr_t[j] = lhit/1000 j = j + 1 endif endif i = i + 1 endwhile close ch1 return
"get_bolt_hit": gosub "get_bolt_len" inxl=1 for i=1 to vardim1(len_arr_t) if len=len_arr_t[i] then inxl=i i=vardim1(len_arr_t) endif next i hit_t = hit_arr_t[inxl] return
"get_inx": ch2 = open("text", file_name, "separator='\t', mode=ro, LIBRARY") inxd=1 n = 1 : j = 1 : k = 2 : t = 0 while n<>-1 and k<=40 do n = input (ch2, 1, k, t) if n <> -1 then if vartype(t)=1 then if t=diam*1000 then inxd=k n = -1 k = 41 endif endif endif k = k + 1 endwhile close ch2 return
